title: 房屋修理
content:
To repair your house, we’ll need you to gather some materials. Please collect 50 wood and 20 stone.

Once you have everything, head to the carpenter and place an order at the counter. Your house will be repaired on the same day!

title: 岛上消遣
content:
Looking for a way to pass the time? Or maybe you want to earn some extra coins while waiting for your crops to grow?

When you have a moment, come visit us at the Beach Shack. We have some welcome gifts for you!

title: 人类见我
content:
Afraid I was, when you summoned me. 
But open the path she has, to my home.

This mean, hooman must come visit me.
Understand you will after meet, how to heal island.
 
Left of your farm, my home. If confused, look at drawing I share.

title: 潜水的机会
content:
The lab is seeking a capable diver to assist with our work. All candidates must complete a compatibility check onsite.

Visit the diving pier to apply.

title: 笑面猎团入团测验
content:
Hey, kid. I’ve noticed the elevator for the Earth shaft now goes down to level 10. I’m aware it was your doing.

Since you’ve shown yourself to be capable, here’s a task: defeat 30 monsters, then swing by our guild once the job is completed. Consider this your entrance exam.

PS: The guild is right beside my house.

title: 满足你的时尚需求！
content:
In just a few days, White Flamingo will open a new boutique in the heart of Starlet Town!

Let us help you find your next new outfit.

Hooman. Thank you for help me.

I want show our village to you.

I talk to <NPCName>Chieftain</>. <NPCName>Chieftain</> says okay.

I wait.

title: 寻找木槿花
content: 我需要一朵<Items>芙蓉</>。你要是有的话，就请送来给我，我会给你酬劳的。

title: 寻找海带
content: 我打算写一篇海洋的文章，所以我需要一瓶无人不晓的<Items>海带</>。你那要是有一份备货可以卖的话，就请跟我说一声吧。

title: 寻找茶叶
content: 这个冬天你会种些茶叶吗？如果种的话，请送一些过来给我吧。我想寄一些本地的茶叶给我<Items>爸妈</>。

title: 市长丢失的帽子
content: 前一阵子我把我的<Items>帽子</>弄丢了。风特别大，把它给吹走了。你要是找到我的<Items>帽子</>的话，麻烦你把它还给我。

title: 寻找蘑菇
content: 珊瑚岛的秋天如何？我的朋友正在找一种<Items>灰喇叭菌</>，他会付大价钱购买。湖泊周围应该长着很多。你要是找到了，请帮我留一份吧。
greetCloseMessage: 等我回去的时候咱再见！

title: 破损画架
content: 你似乎是有很多工具，我能不能借你的<Items>十字锹</>来修我的画架？可以的话，就来我房子的附近见我。别忘了把工具带来！

title: 寻找南瓜
content:
Would you be able to provide me with a pumpkin? I have a recipe I’d like to try.

Good luck with this busy season. I hope to see you around.

title: 寻找向日葵
content: 你能帮我弄来一朵<Items>向日葵</>吗？<NPCName>奥利弗</>的爸爸要过生日了，他和我要为他爸爸做一个向日葵头冠。可问题是，我们没有任何向日葵。你需要在26日之前把它送给我，可以吧？因为他的生日就在那一天。

title: 寻找骨舌鱼
content: 我需要<Items>骨舌鱼</>。这种鱼喜欢寒冷天气，通常会在太阳下山后出没。

title: 寻找木瓜
content: 夏天到了。不知道你是否会在你的农场种木瓜。如果你会种的话，请分我一些吧。我需要两个<Items>木瓜</>，我会出高价买的。

title: 帮个忙！
content: 我打算给<NpcName>弗兰克</>做一顿他最喜欢的晚餐——<Items>单面荷包蛋</>。你能卖我几个蛋吗？我人都在。

title: 邻居的帮助
content: 我承认，我今天给你写信是有目的的。前几天我在收集和整理录像时，发现有几只动物被我家后头的一根大木头给绊倒了，它们都摔伤了。我不想给你添麻烦，但你能把这根木头砍断吗？我没有砍木头的工具，所以我需要你帮帮我。

title: 被偷的岩石箱
content: 我觉得我的<Items>岩石箱</>被人偷了！<NpcName>佐伊</>和我约好了在<Places>湖泊</>附近玩。我也会找找看的，但我下午5点前必须赶回家，妈妈说我必须好好吃蔬菜。

title: 帮我个小忙？
content: 你要是有新鲜的<Items>春天应季蔬菜</>，请给我送一批过来吧。

title: 参观海滩小屋
content: 你要是有空的话就来<Places>沙滩小屋</>吧。

title: 新品到货！
content:
Introducing the Basic Bag. It has a total of twenty compartments. That’s FIVE MORE compartments than a basic tool belt. Carry more, do more, worry less!

Available now at Sam’s General Store for 500 coins.

title: 房屋升级：厨房！
content: 没法做菜的房子就不能称之为家。佐科和我可以升级你的房屋，给你添置一个漂亮的厨房。准备好升级房屋的时候就来找我们吧。

title: 厨房电器
content: 来“插座&平底锅”看看我们的厨房电器！每一种厨房电器都能帮助你烹饪不同种类的菜肴。磨练你的厨艺，拓展你的烹饪眼界！

title: 马
content: 如果你想让生活过得更轻松点，那你应该买一匹马！它们可快了，你要是常常旅行的话，它们能为你省下非常多的时间。你要是感兴趣的话就来找我吧。

title: 是时候打口水井了
content: 我觉着我应该告诉你，如果你想的话，我们可以为你打一口水井。如果你的农场到处都有水源，那干起农活来可能会更容易。

title: 升级你的洒水壶！
content: 如果你还没升级你的浇水壶的话，我可以帮你升级。比起你现在的那把，升级后的浇水壶能浇灌更多的植物。你将需要向我提供一些金属条和一些费用，但这绝对值得。相信我！

title: 季节提醒！
content: 一个季节的结束，就是另一个季节的开始。请注意：你的农作物可能会随着季节变化而枯萎，所以别忘了收获。这个季节的最后一天是28日。另外，请在1日到山姆杂货店购买新的时令种子吧！

title: 恋爱生活
content:
You’re really hitting it off with folks, aren’t you?

Just a heads-up – our island has a tradition. If you want to be more than just friends with someone, you should give them a locket. Otherwise, your friend will stay just that, a friend.

Of course, not everyone will be into receiving a locket. Some people are already married or just not interested in romance, you know? So just keep that in mind when you’re tossing lockets around, okay?

Drop by our shop to grab one!

title: 感谢信
content: I saw that you completed somebody’s request on the bulletin board. I’m impressed. Thank you for actively taking a part in this community.
来森林空屋吧。我们有货出给你。

title: 神秘的信
content:
Word travels fast in the archipelago. You have an eye for hard-to-come-by things, while I am a purveyor of rare finds.

The lighthouse, Tues/Thurs/Fri, after sundown. Discreet business only.

title: 物品升级已完成
content: 你全新闪亮的工具已经准备好了，可以随时提货！请在你方便的时候到店里来吧。

title: 物品栏已满
content: 你收到此邮件是因为你的库存已满。

title: 樱花聚会
content:
We’re gathering at the lake tomorrow to celebrate the start of Spring. There’s a potluck cookout at the festival, so make sure to bring something yummy!

Arrive between 9 am and 2 pm.

title: 种树活动
content:
The town is looking for volunteers to attend the Tree Planting Festival tomorrow.

If you’d like to take part, stop by between 8 am and 2 pm. We meet in the forest right behind your farm. 

We’ll start the festival as soon as we have enough volunteers. We could sure use the helping hand of a farmer like you!
<PlayerName>$player</>，明晚在潜水点西面的海滩见我。6点见。

title: 诺亚的请求：鲜花
content:
Fishensips needs a couple of fresh flowers. Would your farm be able to supply them? If so, please have them delivered as soon as possible.

PS: Sam’s doesn't have a good selection. Gah.

title: 谢谢你
content: 我做多了一点……

title: 诺亚的请求：木头
content: 我正在帮我的大嫂<NPCName>埃里卡</>完成她的学校课业项目。你也知道，她有时候会在学校做志愿者，她下周要教小孩子怎么制作篝火。你明天早上愿意来<Places>花园巷</>帮我砍一些<Items>木头</>来吗？就是米莉屋子附近的那地方。附注：我会带三明治过去。

title: 来自诺亚的礼物
content: 谢谢你昨天的帮忙

title: 查尔斯的回礼
content: 再次感谢你送给我的鱼。这是我答应请你吃的午餐。

title: 小镇评级消息
content:
I’m pleased to announce Starlet Town has reached the rank of E! It’s not quite up to our previous rank, but I believe we can get there by doing our best to maintain this town we call home.

Now that our rank has increased, distributors are slowly returning. Now you can get new fruit seeds from <NPCName>Sam</>, ducks and goats from <NPCName>Jack</>, whole new categories of furniture, and new clothing from the White Flamingo boutique! Also, <NPCName>Joko</> now has the ability to build a silo to upgrade your coop and barn.

I’d like to thank you for helping us make this happen. I hope you continue to support us in returning this town to its former glory.

title: 小镇评级好消息！
content:
I’m happy to announce Starlet Town has reached the rank of D! We’re getting closer to our previous rank, which can only mean good things.

With our rank rising, we’re getting more visitors, and more old distributors are coming back. Now you can get unique seeds from <NPCName>Sam</>, sheep from <NPCName>Jack</>, more new categories of furniture, and new clothing from Wabanana! Also, <NPCName>Joko</> can now build a stable and upgrade your coop and barn.

Thank you once again for your efforts in helping this town. I can see our neighbors regaining their passion for the town. Keep up the good work!

title: 改良实验室
content:
The laboratory is now equipped to do more research, especially on upgrades to crops, seeds, and the like.

To find out more, do visit the laboratory if you have the time!

title: 铁匠铺升级
content: 镇上越来越热闹了，我们也终于升级了火炉。我们现在可以加工更高级的工具了。记得来看看！

title: 小镇评级特好消息！
content:
I’m very pleased to announce Starlet Town has reached the rank of C! We’re now only one step away from our previous high rank. As you can see, the town’s improvements over the previous weeks have been amazing.

With the town rank increasing, the number of visitors and distributors is increasing too. This is bringing a lot of business to our local merchants. Now you can plant a fruit tree with <NPCName>Sam’s</> help, and he also now sells a larger bag. <NPCName>Jack</> can provide you with pigs and quail. Plus, great new categories of furniture and Wabanana clothing are now available! Also, <NPCName>Joko</> can build a greenhouse and further upgrade your coop and barn.

Thank you very much for your efforts in helping this town get back on its feet!

title: 小镇评级重大消息！
content:
I’m delighted to announce Starlet Town has reached the rank of B! We have regained our previous rank, and our town is now back to its former glory.

With our increase in rank, we have regained our previous number of visitors and distributors! Business is booming! Now you can get Winter seeds from <NPCName>Sam</>, and <NPCName>Jack</> can provide you with peafowl. Also, more categories of furniture and trendy Wabanana clothing are available! <NPCName>Joko</> told me he can now build a fish pond and upgrade your house.

I’d like to express my gratitude for your help in restoring the town to its former glory. Amazing job!

title: 小镇评级的重要通知
content:
I’m ecstatic to announce Starlet Town has reached the rank of A!

With our outstanding new rank, we’ve recorded a new high in the number of visitors and distributors! Now you can get a supersized bag from <NPCName>Sam</>, luwaks from <NPCName>Jack</>, and excellent new categories of furniture and Wabanana clothing! Also, <NPCName>Joko</> has informed me he can now build an insect pond.

Thank you very much for helping to make this happen for all of us. It wouldn’t be an overstatement to say your role has been significant. Your efforts have inspired others to contribute more to the town, and it shows in our newest town rank. Well done!

title: 重大突破！
content:
Thanks to your recent contributions that helped the town achieve a higher rank, I now have access to seed splicing. This can help your crops tremendously and increase the variety of your produce.

Do visit the laboratory if you have the time!

title: 近况
content:
How are you? I just wanted to check up on your well-being. We heard you’re a farmer now. I hope things are going well with your farm, but if you ever miss your old job, it’s here.

Let’s chat more about this. Hope to hear from you soon.

title: 警告信
content:
It is imperative that you return to your position at HyperForce. 

Your contract clearly states that you must provide us with a certain amount of work, which you have not completed to this date.

If you do not fulfill this condition, we will have no choice but to file a lawsuit against you and seek compensation for the damages incurred by your lapse in judgment.

However, we are willing to drop any retaliation against you if you return to work within the week.

Regards,
J. Doe
Senior Manager

title: 恳求信
content:
It embarrasses me to write this, but please, please return to work. We’re falling apart here. We didn’t realize how important you were to our operation.

What would persuade you to come back? An increase in salary? A penthouse apartment? How about a free gym membership? Free lunch and dinner? A personal appeal from me?

You know what? I’ll visit your farm myself and convince you to come back. 

Wait for my arrival, <PlayerName>$Player</>. We’ll talk soon.

Your best friend,
J. Doe
Senior Manager

title: 奶奶的信 - 1
content:
How are you doing, sweetheart? I heard Coral Island is beautiful this time of year. Grandpa, Ashley, and I miss you very much.


PS: Here’s some money for you. It isn’t much, but we hope it’s useful.

title: 奶奶的信 - 2
content: 离我上次写信已经有一段时间了。你在那里过得怎么样，宝贝？我们每天都很想你。阿什莉最近有点不对劲，它连最喜欢的食物都不爱吃了，而且好多次都夜不归宿。我们准备这几天就带它去看兽医。还有，我们给你做了一些最喜欢吃的椰丝球。

title: 奶奶的信 - 3
content:
How’s the farm, sweetheart? We saw some articles about Coral Island’s Cherry Blossom Festival. The event looked beautiful. I think I might’ve spotted you in one of the photos!

PS: Ashley is pregnant!

title: 奶奶的信 - 4
content:
It’s been a while since I heard from you, sweetheart. We miss you so much. Your dad said you’re doing well at the farm. It’s great news, and we’re very proud. We baked you some cookies yesterday. Hope they’re still good.

PS: Ashley and the kittens are all healthy. We ended up naming one of them Sandal because he always sleeps right next to my sandals. Your grandpa and I are happy, busy grandparents again.

title: 奶奶的信 - 5
content:
Your parents sent us an article about you making a quarter of a million coins! We’re so happy you’ve found your community and you’re thriving on Coral Island. We sent some extra money to add to the pile! The kittens are taking over our bedroom. We let them sleep there with us. There’s no winning with those cuties.

We’re beyond proud of you, <PlayerName>$Player</>.

title: 我们的感谢信
content:
It’s heartwarming to see you helping out on the island. There were a few folks that weren’t so sure about you moving in. I won’t say who they are, but I will tell you they’ve come to me to say they’ve changed their minds about you.

Keep up the good work!

title: 我们的感谢信
content: 谢谢你在岛上四处伸出援手。镇上的居民和我想要感谢你对社区的贡献。希望我们的小礼物能派上些用场。

title: 我们的感谢信
content: 我们大家都知道你非常乐于助人，但当我看到你为社区做出了这么多的贡献，我还是觉得非常惊喜。附上我们的一点感谢心意。大家都很高兴，你已经成为了我们这座迷人小镇的一份子。

title: 我们的感谢信
content: 你已经帮小星镇的居民做了100件事。100件哇！你为这个社区做出了了不起的贡献。非常感谢！

title: 你昏倒了
content: 昨晚，我发现你脸朝下躺着，非常担心！当时外面很黑，我还以为出了什么大事。总之，午夜过后就不要再熬夜了，对身体不好。我让尤里去看看你，确保你没事。你的医疗账单就附在这封信后面。

title: 注意身体！
content: 你昨晚劳累过度，晕倒了。附上你的医疗账单。别累着自己了。记得劳逸结合，按时吃饭。祝你早日康复！

title: 配方：野生蘑菇玉米面
content: 我刚想出来一个新食谱。你可以试着做一下！就是……别用太多那种棕色蘑菇，懂吧？

title: 配方：月饼
content: 你做过烘焙吗？对我来说烘焙非常解压，说不定对你也有帮助。总之，随信附上月饼的食谱，你可以在家试着做做看！

title: 配方：菠萝蜜派
content: 随信附上菠萝蜜派食谱，希望你喜欢。请别忘记，我只选用新鲜收获的菠萝蜜做原材料。

title: 食谱：卷饼
content: 用本地农产品做成的墨西哥卷饼就是最棒的美食。这是一份墨西哥卷饼食谱，教你怎么自己做卷饼，希望对你有帮助！

title: 菜谱：鱼汤
content: 这是我最喜欢的鱼汤食谱，分享给你。是我已故妻子的做法。希望你和我一样爱喝。

title: 菜谱：炸豆豉
content: 你试过炸印尼丹贝吗？如果你有兴趣的话，附上我的食谱。记得告诉我你喜不喜欢。

title: 配方：香蕉油条
content: 你试过炸香蕉吗？如果你有兴趣的话，附上我的食谱。记得告诉我你喜不喜欢。

title: 食谱：夏威夷披萨
content: 你可能想要这个食谱。这是夏威夷披萨。

title: 食谱：什锦烤拼盘
content: 这食谱是我在家最喜欢做的菜之一。简单又美味！它也可能会成为你最爱的。

title: 食谱：鱼肉卷
content: 希望每年的这个时候，你的农场都一切顺利。这是我最喜欢的菜之一：鱼肉塔可。做法稍微有点复杂，但我对你有信心，你肯定能做出来。

title: 食谱：素食玉米饼
content: 希望每年的这个时候，你的农场都一切顺利。这是我最喜欢的菜之一：纯素塔可。我的塔可餐车卖的就是这种哦。

title: 食谱：胡椒蘑菇大饼
content: 这是我从一个朋友那里学来的食谱，这个朋友是从另一个朋友那里学来的……好吧，你懂我的意思吧。我会继续这条流水线并接着传给你！

title: 食谱：面包
content: 在山姆店里我们就是这么烤面包的，你可以自己在家做。在家做可能会更便宜哟！

title: 配方: 馅饼
content: 这是我做挞的食谱。自己在家做可能会更便宜哟！

title: 食谱：玉米棒子
content: 附上了玉米棒食谱，给我最喜爱的农夫。本烧烤大师可不是浪得虚名的。哈！

title: 配方。基拉查辣酱
content: 给你准备了制作泰式辣酱的说明。使用新鲜的材料就能做出最好吃的辣酱来，它能够给清淡的餐点提味，让它们吃起来特别带劲！

title: 菜谱: 垫泰
content: 我想跟你分享我的泰式炒粉食谱。上周日我为家人做的，很受欢迎。让我知道你的想法。

title: 菜谱：烟熏三文鱼
content: 要是你忘了怎么熏制三文鱼，就看看我给你写好的食谱吧。给你。

title: 配方：蔬果奶昔
content: 给你蔬果奶昔食谱，我答应过的。

title: 菜谱：炒芥菜
content: 这里有一份食谱，能教你怎么做简单脆脆的午餐——炒牛皮菜。

title: 食谱：海鲜拉面
content: 你要是喜欢海鲜拉面的话，就试试这份食谱吧。我最喜欢的餐点，绝对“面”不可言！
greetCloseMessage: 这是个小小的面条玩笑，

title: 配方：烤箱烘烤的意大利饭
content: 我在我的抽屉里找到了这份食谱，它八成是我妈的，我想你可能会用得上。

title: 菜谱：烤栗子
content: 给你一份烤板栗的食谱，我已经吃了太多了，现在已经吃腻了，但这是一道特别好吃，又很容易做的餐点。

title: 配方。(炸弹！)团子
content: 这个面疙瘩食谱非常好用！试一试，告诉我你的想法。

title: 配方：(绝赞！）披萨
content: 这个披萨食谱非常好用！试一试，告诉我你的想法。

title: 食谱：水煮蛋
content: 给你一份简单的煮鸡蛋食谱。

title: 食谱：炒饭，又称纳西戈尔宁
content: 昨天让我想起了我在印度尼西亚的童年。我想你可能想尝尝我心目中的疗愈食物：炒饭。我们也称它为“nasi goreng”。

title: 配方：香草豆豉
content: 不太确定你知不知道怎么做香料印尼丹贝。做法特简单，你拿去看看吧！

title: 菜谱：蜘蛛天妇罗
content: 这封信的后头附上了蜘蛛天妇罗的食谱。这种餐点我是没那么想吃啦，但它实际吃起来，没它的名字听起来那么糟糕。

title: 食谱：生菜包
content: 尽管食物可以做得非常奢华，但我个人更钟爱简朴食物所呈现的优雅风范。你应该多多注意自己所吃的食物。我分享这份食谱给你，是因为我很关心你的饮食。

title: 食谱: 饭团
content: 前几天我试了这个饭团食谱，特别好吃。要是你想试试看的话，可以在这封信的背面找到写好的食谱。

title: 食谱：菠萝蜜派
content: 我记得你很喜欢我们在旅馆做的菠萝蜜派。这是它的食谱！要不要试试自己做？

title: 食谱：鹰嘴豆泥
content: 我寄给你我们最喜欢的食谱之一，鹰嘴豆泥。你快试着做一下吧~

title: 礼物物品
content: 送你一份礼物。

title: 城镇评级公告
content:
To address the declining number of tourists on our island, the mayor’s office invited a Funlop Agency representative to rank our town. We’re expecting some sort of award ceremony at the community center.

This is going to be our first-ever town ranking!
Hopefully, the media coverage we get from being a top-rated island will boost our tourism.

title: 来自社区的礼物
content:
We wanted to do something special for you to celebrate our move to Coral Island. Our community outreach team discovered the hot spring wasn’t functional anymore. What a shame!

We couldn’t let that pass, so we sent our brightest scientists and engineers to figure out the problem. We are pleased to inform you that the hot spring is 100% fully functional again! No need to thank us, residents. Your happy, smiling faces are enough thanks for us.

title: 神秘的信
content: 我觉得时候到了。来码头吧。

title: 你的电脑有风险
content: 把你的账号和密码发来，我们会为你解决这个问题。请一定要把<RickText.Place>密码</>发来——没有它我们就没法解决问题！

title: 水上活动
content:
I hope you’re settling in well. Seems like now is a good time to let you know about water activities on Coral Island.

When you have time, you should visit <NpcName>Ling</> in the lab to learn more about diving.
Also, <NpcName>Sunny</> at the Beach Shack can tell you a bit about fishing!

title: 你的电脑有风险
content: 把你的账号和密码发来，我们会为你解决这个问题。请一定要把<RickText.Place>密码</>发来——没有它我们就没法解决问题！

title: 博物馆开幕邀请（请答复）
content: <Places>博物馆</>将于明天开幕，我们预计到时将是水泄不通，所以早点来。俗话说得好，早起的鸟儿有虫吃！

We’ve compiled all the coral data you’ve collected while diving, and we’d like to share the results with you.

Do come by the lab if you have time. We can discuss it then.

title: 城镇排名：一个提高我们知名度的想法!
content: 你让我想到了一个提升我们小镇受欢迎度的点子。它会需要山姆参与。有空时来杂货店和我见面，我会在那里跟你作进一步解释！

title: 冒险在等着你
content: 你已经清除了大地矿井，这是一个非常了不起的成就！然而，新的冒险就在前方等着你。矿井的另一部分已经开通，正在等待你的到来。尽情去探索吧。

title: 学习木箱配方
content: 我们忘了从游戏中删除这封测试邮件，所以现在你应该已经学会了<RickText.Place>木箱制作配方</>

content: 来<Places>实验室</>和我见面。

We’ve compiled all the coral data you’ve collected while diving, and we’d like to share the results with you.

Please come by the lab when you have time. We have some things to discuss.

content: 你好，这是<RickText.Place>支线任务</>测试邮件。接受以开始任务。

sender: 杰夫·史密斯，农场主协会
title: 挑战完成
content:
I’m glad to hear the rumors about a new farmer in Starlet Town are true. You’ve been doing excellent work in the fields.

Give this fertilizer a try. Apply it to tilled soil. It’ll increase your chances of harvesting higher-quality crops, which will fetch more coins when it’s time to sell.

sender: 杰夫·史密斯，农场主协会
title: 挑战完成
content:
It looks like you’re ready for this. This is a basic sprinkler.

Place it in your field, and it’ll water some of your crops for you. The best part? You can craft as many of these as you need, as long as you have the necessary materials.

title: 发布众筹网众筹项目
content: 好消息！我们准备启动我们的Pickstarter众筹项目，但是缺少你的帮助我们是办不到的！来博物馆和我们一起启动它吧。

title: 我们成功了！
content:
I can’t believe this. We actually reached our Pickstarter goal in just one day! Oh man, this is so exciting. I didn’t think we’d get there so fast! 

Since we hit our goal so early, we’re adding some stretch goals for the campaign. Basically, our museum is going to be bigger and grander than originally planned! But I’ll have to talk to Mayor <NPCName>Connor</> and <NPCName>Millie</> about this.

I’ll update you again soon.

title: 支持仍在不断涌来
content:
I can’t believe it. People are still donating. <NPCName>Millie</> and I talked about it, and we want to honor the backers. We’ll have a new room in the museum with the names of all the contributors engraved on the walls and statues for the higher-level backers. We’re calling it the Founders’ Hall.

We want this to be a grand memento of the people who’ve helped us get to this point.

Exciting things are happening, <PlayerName>$player</>.

title: 尘埃落定
content:
Well. It’s official. The campaign is closed, and we reached four times our original goal! It’s blowing my mind! I’m running out of words to describe how I feel.

We’ll start construction on the Founders’ Hall as soon as possible. We’ll have an opening party and everything!

I’ll come get you on the day of the grand opening.

title: 当地产品
content: 我想向你提出一个关于当地农产品的想法。如果你有时间，请到杂货店找我。

title: 食谱：春菜肉馅煎蛋饼
content: 我想把这个春菜肉馅煎蛋饼的食谱作为小礼物送给你。不要让这个名字骗了你。只要你有原料，你可以在一年中的任何时候做这个。

title: 食谱：黄油牛角包
content: 我听说做黄油羊角面包会有点难，但我相信这个食谱会帮助你。妈妈做了很多次，我可以保证它的效果。

title: 食谱：牛油果酱
content: 你知道如何制作牛油果酱吗？不知道的话，我送你一个简单的食谱！你可以试一下！

title: 食谱：素食拉面
content: 你最近好吗？我希望每天吃健康的饭菜。如果你想吃一些新的东西，这个是我最喜欢的饭菜的食谱。
greetOpenMessage: 亲爱的<PlayerName>$player</>，我们出色的凤头鹦鹉，

title: 食谱：茄子千层面
content: 你吃过茄子千层面吗？这很美味！我从我在国外的一个朋友那里得到了这个食谱。我不太会做饭，但这是一个非常简单的食谱。你试一下吧？

title: 食谱：蛤蜊浓汤
content: 你好吗？我正在翻阅我们的家庭食谱，而这个蛤蜊浓汤的食谱就掉了！我们都不经常用这个食谱，妈妈说我可以给你。总比浪费好吧？

title: 食谱：罗勒香蒜意大利面
content: 我在外面找到了这个。它是你的吗？

title: 食谱：红薯布丁
content: 只想和你打个招呼。如果你想试着做甘薯普丁，我有它的食谱。这是我最喜欢的安慰餐。试试看！

title: 食谱：生鱼片
content: 我见过你在岛上钓鱼。这是生鱼片的食谱。你可以使用任何鱼。

sender: 杰夫·史密斯，农场主协会
title: 挑战完成
content:
It seems like you’re ready for this. This is a mayonnaise machine. Just place any egg into this here gizmo, and it’ll produce mayonnaise. And just like that, you’ve made an artisan product!

Artisan products are made using artisan machines, and they fetch a nice profit. They’re great gizmos to have on your farm, ya hear?

sender: 杰夫·史密斯，农场主协会
title: 挑战完成
content:
You’re now an advanced farmer. Great job, Sprout! My last gift to you is a blueprint for an aging barrel.

Place items into the aging barrel to produce aged artisan products. These yield the most profit, though they do require some time to mature.

title: 巨人村
content: 巨人忘记了人类不能进入村庄。来村里吧，我为人类开路。

title: 笑面猎团
content: 笑面猎团 - 还在修炼中

title: 龚的请求
content:
<NPCName>龚</>几乎拥有<NPCName>龚</>需要的所有东西，但<NPCName>龚</>仍然缺少一些东西。这就是<NPCName>龚</>需要的东西，人类能帮忙吗？

黑色的圆眼罩
咩咩动物的头发
任何花
大块大块的布，就像大船夫穿的那样

title: 访问岛屿
content:
I wanted to let you know the island ferry express is now running again. 

What is it, you ask? It’s me and my boat, and I take you into the waters. You can visit nearby islands, where you might have some friends you’d like to visit. 

Where is it, you ask? Remember where I dropped you off your first day here? That’s where.

title: 宠物收养
content:
Dear residents of Starlet Town,

The animal shelter is now officially open. We have a variety of adorable pets you can take home. Visit us at the community center, first room on the right. I guarantee you won’t leave empty handed!

title: Kickstarter独家 "农夫装"。
content:
We have two things for you today:

- Kickstarter Exclusive “Farmer Outfit” set (Backer farmer outfit)
- Additional free cosmestic (Panda backer farmer outfit)

Thank you for supporting us and for your patience during the key distribution chaos last year.

title: 婚姻生活
content:
Hey, there, <PlayerName>$player</>,

Looks like you’re making some really special connections.

If things are getting serious and you’re considering marriage, we have an island tradition for that. You’ll want to propose to your special someone with a diamond ring.

Does this sound like you? If so, drop by our shop and grab one!

title: 石化的犯罪者
content: 休息好了，准备给我们讲故事<NPCName>朱</>是。必须到巨人村里来，你是。会需要你的帮助，我们是。

title: 你的钓鱼技巧棒棒哒!
content:
I’ve been watching your progress, and I must say, your fishing skills are outstanding! I’m so glad you accepted our welcoming gifts when you first moved to the island. 

To help you level up even more, I’m sending you another special gift – a fish pond. With this pond, you’ll be able to breed fish and continue to increase your skills.

title: 你的捕虫技巧棒棒哒!
content:
I couldn’t help but notice how awesome you are at catching insects! I’m so glad you’ve been using the welcoming gifts we gave you when you moved in. 

To keep that momentum going, I’m gifting you an insect house. You’ll be able to breed insects and become a true bug-catching master!

title: 让耕作变得更容易!
content:
I’ve been working on automation and quality-of-life devices! They’ll make things easier for you on the farm.

Here’s a prototype of one of them, the auto fertilizer. This nifty gadget can be attached to your sprinklers, and when loaded with fertilizer, it’ll automatically disperse it in the surrounding soil.

I can make the blueprint if you provide me with materials for R&D. This will allow you to craft it using basic materials. If you’re interested, come by the lab to see some of the prototypes for other devices I’ve made.

title: 明天是动物节!
content: 不要忘记！动物节将于明天上午9点在社区中心对面举行。请确保你们的动物已经为友谊赛做好准备。

title: 准备好迎接动物节吗？
content: 动物节即将在夏季12日举行。带上你的宠物来参加一个有趣的比赛。如果你有一只鸡或牛，请让它们参加比赛吧! 活动于上午9点在社区中心对面开始。

title: 明天的海滩清理活动!
content: 明天，夏天27日，上午9点，加入我们的年度海滩清洁活动。让我们一起努力，清理我们的海滩，并享受有趣的游戏。欢迎穿泳衣，但不是必须的。我们提供饮料。

title: 准备好迎接丰收节吗？
content:
The Harvest Festival is coming up on Fall 15 at 7 pm in Alun-Alun Square. Legendary farmer Jeff Smith will be the judge for the harvest display contest. To enter, bring your best products from each of the following six categories:
- Vegetables
- Fruits
- Flowers
- Coop products
- Barn products
- Artisan products

title: 明天是丰收节!
content: 丰收节将于明天晚上7点在阿伦阿伦广场举行。记得带上你的六件最佳物品参加丰收对决比赛。

title: 灵异节明天开始!
content: 准备好迎接从明天开始为期两天的灵异节吗？从晚上7点开始在镇上参加我们的游戏，服装，和鬼屋的活动。不要独自进去鬼屋。找个伙伴，放开手脚，过一个诡异的季节吧!

title: 冬季市集明天开始!
content: 冬季市集从明天开始，持续三天，从冬季21-24日。从下午1点到深夜，请到海滩上加入我们。那里将有商店、游戏和最好的冬季庆祝活动。

title: 明天是除夕大餐!
content: 我们邀请您参加明天冬季28日晚上7点在山坡葡萄园举行的除夕大餐。这是一个让社区居民聚集在一起，享受游戏和烟花的时刻，对于爱侣来说，是一种别样的浪漫!
greetCloseMessage: 让我们一起迎接新年的到来

title: 嘿！
content: 你今晚有什么安排？来澡堂找我吧。和我一起放松一下。

title: 甜心游戏观看派对
content: 他们明天会播我参加的那集。我们要在旅馆开个观看派对。来和我们一起看吧！

title: 送别我的斯蒂芬
content: 终于要和斯蒂芬说再见了。如果你能来的话，请在 6 点到海滩来。我想我一个人做不到。

title: 我邀请你们
content: 你想和我约会吗？如果想，我会在日落时在海滩上等你。

title: 小镇历史
content: 有空来图书馆找我。我发现了一些你可能感兴趣的东西！
今晚海滩见。有东西给你...

title: 别墅宴会
content: 今晚请到别墅参加我的晚宴。我有一个重要的消息要宣布，希望你能到场。

title: 致太空
content: 有时间就来竹林吧。艾丽娅的飞船今天就要发射了。和我们一起看吧

title: 和我一起玩吧
content: 今天天气很好。来海滩和我一起打排球吧。别太晚到！阳光真好。

title: 森林约会
content:
Up for a date night? Meet me tonight near the caravan.
Have a good day! Don’t skip breakfast.

title: 和我一起治疗
content:
Have you ever done sound healing?

Join me in the forest at noon. It’s therapeutic.

title: 鬼......？
content:
I think I’m being watched.

Whenever I’m around the villa late at night, I feel like somebody is trying to talk to me.

When I look back, nothing is there.

Do you believe in ghosts? I’m not sure I do, but meet me at the villa around 8 pm.

We will catch this thing. Will you tell Scott about it too? Bring some basil, just in case we need it for protection.

title: 私人晚餐
content: 希望你收到这封信时一切安好。我想邀请你参加今晚的私人晚餐。我在阿伦阿伦广场为你安排了晚餐。期盼你的到来。
我租了一些皮艇。想去海边玩玩吗？中午来吧。
明晚有约会吗？晚上7点去我家，什么都不用带

title: 哈喽，小可爱
content: 我们去约会吧，就你和我 。晚上七点码头见。不要带任何东西，你可爱的样子就足够了。

title: 与朋友聚会
content:
It’s Scott. I was thinking about you and how much fun we always have when we hang out.

Maybe you can come to the Tavern this evening at 7 pm and meet my friends.

We’re going to have so much fun.

Don’t make me go to your farm and get you!

title: 就我们俩
content:
Scott here. Come to my house tonight after work.

So, around 7ish. Want to show you something.

title: 天文台约会
content:
I have something to show you. Come to the observatory tomorrow night! If it’s okay with you, I’d like to take you out for dinner afterward. Just you and me.

PS: It’s a DATE. Hope that was obvious and okay with you!

title: 你看到我的笔了吗？
content:
Did I leave my pen at your farm? I’m pretty sure I had it with me when I was there for your health record.

Look around for me, will you?

title: 对不起...
content:
Please forgive me for such an abrupt end to our conversation yesterday. 

Duty calls, yada yada yada. Will you meet me tonight at the beach after work?
我发现了一幅旧画。我想你可能会喜欢。

title: 鱼肉卷晚餐？
content:
Are you free for dinner tomorrow night? I was thinking maybe we could have some fish tacos from <NPCName>Emma’s</> truck.

I have a little something set up. Nothing crazy, so don’t dress up.

Stop by the clinic around 6 pm, and we’ll go together.

title: 最好吃的鱼肉卷
content: 昨晚的鱼肉卷太棒了。我玩得很开心。

title: 一封邀请函
content:
In recognition of your service to our kingdom, King <NPCName>Krakatoa</> and Queen <NPCName>Nanda Devi</> extend an invitation for you to visit Naga Castle.

We look forward to welcoming you at the castle.

title: 仪式
content:
Greetings from <NPCName>Cho Oyu</>. The fates have chosen wisely, letting you into our kingdom.
I request your presence in my chambers. There’s a ritual the spirits urge me perform on your behalf that will be worth your while.

title: 体力不支晕倒
content: 你昨天晕倒了，所以我带你去了诊所。他们说你身体刚刚已经撑到极限了。他们还把你的医疗账单交给了我，所以我把它转交给你了。它们就附在信封里。

title: 体力不支晕倒
content: 朋友，昨天你可把我吓坏了。看到你晕倒的样子，真是吓人的！医生说是极度疲劳。请你今天放轻松点。你的医疗账单我附上在信封里。

title: 体力不支晕倒
content: 你昨天晕倒了。我把你送到了医院。你需要更好地照顾自己。看看这封信后面的医疗账单吧。

title: 体力不支晕倒
content: 昨天我看见你晕倒了，就赶紧把你送到医院。老实说，这挺吓人的。希望你早日康复。你的医疗账单就附在这封信后面。

title: 体力不支晕倒
content: 你还好吗？我昨天看到你晕倒了。我很担心你。希望你快点好起来。你的医疗账单就附在这封信后面。

title: 体力不支晕倒
content: 昨天我发现你晕倒了。我很担心，所以带你去了诊所。希望你早日康复，我的小鹰。你的医疗账单就在这封信后面。

title: 体力不支晕倒
content:
I saw you passed out yesterday and carried you to the hospital. I was told it was nothing serious, but you do need to rest. Hope you feel better soon.

You’ll find your hospital bill behind this letter.

title: 体力不支晕倒
content: 昨天我看见你晕倒了。你太累了，我跟你讲。希望你能尽快恢复健康！你的医疗账单就附上在这封信后面。

title: 体力不支晕倒
content:
Are you okay? I found you passed out yesterday, and you were sweating so much! I think you’ve been working too hard. Please get some rest.

The hospital also told me to give you this bill. I hope you get better soon.

title: 体力不支晕倒
content:
I found you passed out yesterday. The doctors told me you’re suffering from extreme fatigue. Please rest.

PS: The medical bill is in this envelope. Hope you feel better soon!

Just a heads up – your animals might get sick if it’s too hot or too cold or if they’re not looked after properly. If that happens, animal medicine is your best friend. You can pick some up at my ranch or the clinic.

I’ve tossed in a dose with this letter. Better safe than sorry, right?

title: 请帮助我
content:
I’m in the doghouse now, so to speak! I forgot <NPCName>Anne’s</> birthday, and I need to fix this fast.

Unfortunately, I’m too busy to look myself, so I’m going to need your help to find me some green tea. One is fine!

If you can find it, I’ll owe you a big one.

title: 珊瑚岛：海洋探险家慈善 DLC 包
content:
We have three things for you today:

- Ocean Explorer Outfit
- Ocean Explorer Chest and Crafting Recipe
- Ocean Explorer Scarecrow and Crafting Recipe

Make an oath to save the ocean – and our own real, beautiful world – with the limited-time Ocean Explorer Charity DLC Pack for your Coral Island character, fit for a true explorer of planet Earth’s aquatic ecosystems.

title: 没有参加丰收节？
content:
Guess what? You weren’t at the Harvest Festival! But that’s okay. Maybe competitions just aren’t your thing.

You seemed a little shy when we first met, right? It’s all good, though, buddy.

Daddy always used to say, “Courage is the first step to victory.” Looks like you’re still trying to find your shoes, huh?

Don’t sweat it, though. If you’re ever in Beluga Bay, drop by and check out my trophy. It’s pretty cool.

title: 明年我会赢的, <PlayerName>$Player</>
content:
So you won this time, huh? Well, I guess everyone needs their day in the sun.

But don’t get too cozy up there. You’ve just fired me up to push even harder.

Daddy once told me, “Bobby, winning is temporary, but being a winner is forever.” And believe me, next year, I’m reclaiming my victory.

Enjoy your moment, <PlayerName>$Player</>. Because next year, it’s Bobby time!

title: 胜利的喜悦， <PlayerName>$Player</>
content:
Just wanted to take a quick breather from my victory dance to drop you this little note. Gotta admit, the view’s pretty spectacular from the top!

You put in some effort, but, well, there’s something about Beluga Bay. It’s got that special magic.

Catch you later.

title: 平局？？？
content:
A draw? With you? I gotta be honest, I didn’t see that coming. But, hey, even a broken clock is right twice a day, right?

I’ve already got big plans for next year, and there’s no room for sharing the spotlight.

So you better start your prep now, ’cause I’m certainly revving up my engine!

title: 我们来谈一下价值积分！
content:
We’ve started a new initiative called “Merit Points,” a reward system for community involvement. I’d love to explain more in person. 
                       
Join me at the community center soon. Looking forward to it!

title: 镇长办公室正式通知
content:
Please join me at the town hall in the community center for an important announcement concerning our beloved town.

This is an occasion you won’t want to miss!

title: 2 级实验室设备！
content:
Exciting news! With the town now at rank D, we’ve received more grants. That means more advanced quality-of-life devices to help you out!

Check this out: we now have the Auto Petter and the Sturdy Computer. The Auto Petter takes care of your animals, and the computer? It has online shopping!

I have the blueprints ready, but I’ll need materials for R&D. Drop by the lab to see other gadgets that are now available.

title: 第 3 级实验室设备！
content:
With the town climbing up to rank C, our funding has seen a bump. That means even cooler quality-of-life gadgets for the farm are now on the table!

Let me introduce you to a couple: the Auto Chest and the Ultimate Scarecrow. The Auto Chest automates your production and can even turn into a conveyor belt. The scarecrow? It covers a 19x19 field!

As usual, I’ve drafted up the blueprints, but I’ll need specific materials for R&D. Swing by the lab when you can.

title: 来自博物馆的惊喜
content: 我为我们在博物馆准备了一些特别的东西。我想你会喜欢的。今晚七点在博物馆见。

title: 海上航行
content: 你愿意和我约会吗？中午在海滩见

title: 午后野餐
content: 今天下午想去野餐吗？我们三点在米莉家附近碰头吧

title: 宝藏
content: 在社区中心等我。我们一起去告诉市长。

title: 看电影
content: 我跟你约了今晚去海边 希望你有空！

title: Kickstarter 独家 "神话宠物"
content:
We’re thrilled to introduce two mythical pets to the Coral Island world: dragon and lembus! 

Enclosed is a special transformation kit that holds the power to unlock these mythical companions in-game.

Here’s how it works: 

Simply give this item to your regular pet and witness the enchantment as they magically transform into either a dragon or a lembus. And don’t forget, if you ever want to revert them to their original form, you can easily remove the outfit.

title: Thank you
content:
Please accept this sake.

Thank you for your help with packing the other day.

We truly gained a star the day you decided to move here.
